name: Giant
passiveSkills: Heal for 15% of all damage dealt and 50% of all damage received
Gain 1 Power when you take damage
35% Chance to Inflict Freeze, Perfect Crave, and Perfect Accuracy Down on a random enemy when you take damage
Fully Heal self and Revive a random ally, and inflict an unblockable Freeze on each enemy for 1 turn when you reach 1 HP.
